Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration>Welcome, good sir! <sp:5:0:0>Care to try one of
our famous <clr:0000>Malanya Buns<clr:ffff>?

It's a very popular new pastry that
our stable's offering to celebrate the
great <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>.
It's crispy on the outside, soft on
the inside, and might even give you a 
little <clr:0000>luck<clr:ffff>!
Best of all, it can be yours for just
<clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>! What do you say?
Talk30:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I've got plenty more Malanya Buns, so if
you want another, just ask!
Talk31:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>I wish I could give Malanya one of these
buns. Maybe then he'd have the energy to
leave his bud.
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Now that Malanya's feeling better, I might
go and offer him a few buns!
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration>How would you like one of our delicious
<clr:0000>Malanya Buns<clr:ffff>?

Only <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>!
Talk34:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Can I interest you in one of our
world-famous <clr:0000>Malanya Buns<clr:ffff>?

It's crispy on the outside, soft on
the inside, and might even give you a
little <clr:0000>luck<clr:ffff>!
And it's only <clr:0000>10 rupees<clr:ffff>! Interested?
Talk35:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>First, close your eyes... <sp:5:0:0>Imagine the god
of horses standing in front of you...

<sp:0:2:2:7d00>Then open wide and stuff it in!<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration>Heya! <sp:5:0:0>Welcome to East Akkala Stable,
stomping ground of the horse god!
Talk02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Admiration>Welcome, good sir!<sp:5:0:0> Looks like today's a
wet one.

Let's make this fast, shall we?
Talk38:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>Hey, you're on the god of horses' turf
now. Put on some clothes.
Talk04:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>You got some kind of <clr:0000>problem with
your horse<clr:ffff>?

You'd be better off talking to <clr:0000>Malanya<clr:ffff>,
the god of horses about itâ€”<sp:5:0:0>not me.
Talk21:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>So... We want our customers to enjoy
<clr:0000>Malanya Buns <clr:ffff>at their freshest.

Which means you have to eat it here.<sp:5:0:0>
Is that OK?
Talk22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Gotcha. If you change your mind, just
come find me, 'K?
Talk40:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Take that road behind the stable to reach
him without getting lost.<sp:5:1:0>
Talk41:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>That's all for me. I've got <clr:0000>buns <clr:ffff>to sell.<sp:5:0:0>
Later, pal!
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0300>Oh, this is awkward. You don't have
enough rupees.

How about you fatten up your wallet a bit,
and then come back?
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_00>Thanks, bud!


There's a procedure you have to follow
when you eat this, so listen closely.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_01>With the bun in your mouth, turn toward
the god of horses. Facing him, ponder his
awesome power...
And chew like you've never chewed
before! But keep that mouth closed!

Then swallow before it dissolves!
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive_00>So! What do you think?


Tasty, right? And not just that, but you
feel changed somehow, huh?
Talk28: <sp:3:0:2:0800>I can tell you look a little different now!
Talk29:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Huh... Actually, you don't seem much
different than before.

Guess you ate it wrong. Tough luck!
